entities.name: bill
entities.description: Harry's friend and Ron's brother, who has been bitten by a werewolf.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, referred to as being on the same level as Bill.

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: The matron who is trying to heal Bill's wounds.

relationships.description: Harry is concerned about Bill's condition and asks Madam Pomfrey if she can fix his wounds with a charm.
Ron is also concerned about Bill's condition and tries to reassure him that he won't be a true werewolf.
